com.salimov.yurii.repository

Interface CompanyRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>, DataRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Company>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Company,java.lang.Long>

    public interface CompanyRepository
extends DataRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>
    The interface provides a set of JPA methods for working Company objects with a database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    DataRepository, Company
